page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE 5.
page.content: My mother-in Law is 81 years old. She has to rely on me for transport to take her anywhere as she cannot walk too far now. I take her every two weeks to the Derby and Joan Club(a club for old aged pensioners) in Hamstreet, to the Women's Institute meetings in Appledore once a month and to the "Good Companions" club also in Appledore once a month. All of these are clubs where she meets people for two or three hours one afternoon and they have people who come and give a talk or demonstration on interesting subjects. We also go out shopping together once a week so that she can get any shopping she requires. Sometimes the clubs mentioned have outings to various places and she goes out quite a bit on coach trips with the people she meets at the clubs.
